name: Matrix LED clock
tagline: Bedroom clock using 8x8 LED matrix display
body:
Matrix LED Clock
============

The goal of this project is to make nice bedroom clock with 8x8 LED matrices.

![](https://raw.github.com/snakeye/matrix-clock/master/pictures/pic3.jpg)

Features:

* 8x8 Common Cathode **LED matrices**
* **ATMega32** microcontroller
* **DS1307** realtime clock
* **MAX7219** display drivers
* **HC-05** bluetooth module
* Ambient **light sensor**

![](https://raw.github.com/snakeye/matrix-clock/master/pictures/pic1.jpg)
